description:
reflect: temporarily disable big args test

Update issue 6023
Update issue 6033

Temporarily remove the test added in a5eb738ff649 / CL 12053043. It triggers a compiler bug which causes the compiler to consume gigabytes of virtual memory.

subject: code review 12484043: reflect: temporarily disable big args test
